title: Gandhi (1982) - Motion Picture Soundtrack - FLAC
description:
EXTREMELY RARE AND LONG OUT-OF-PRINT !!!   PLEASE HELP SHARE!!!

Gandhi (1982) Original Motion Picture Soundtrack (FLAC)
Includes high-quality images of original artwork.

The original LP was professionally cleaned and digitized to CD using the following equipment:

Cleaner:	Loricraft PRC4.
Turntables:	Technics SL-1200 (ingeniously modified for computer control).
Preamps:	Creek OBH 15, discrete circuits.
Needles:	Denon DL103, moving coil.
Sound cards:	M-Audio Delta 1010, 32bit @ 44100 samples/second.

The CD was then ripped to FLAC using MediaMonkey 3.0.3.1183

Enjoy!
